t: Worship in the Splendor of Holiness
Oh*pn sing to the Lord*s a new song; sing*ld to the Lord,*s all the earth!
Sing*ln to the Lord,*s bless his name; tell*ld of his salvation from day to day.
Declare*ln his glory among the nations, his*ld marvelous works among all the peoples!
For*ln great is the Lord,*s and greatly to be praised; he*ld is to be feared above all gods.
For*ln all the gods of the peoples are worthless idols, but*ld the Lord*s made the heavens.
Splendor*ln and majesty are before him; strength*ld and beauty are in his sanctuary.
Ascribe*pn to the Lord,*s O families of the peoples, ascribe*ld to the Lord*s glory and strength!
Ascribe*ln to the Lord*s the glory due his name; bring*ld an offering, and come into his courts!
Worship*ln the Lord*s in the splendor of holiness; tremble*ld before him, all the earth!
Say*pn among the nations, “The Lord*s reigns! Yes,*ld the world is established; it shall never be moved; he*ld will judge the peoples with equity.”
Let*pn the heavens be glad, and let the earth rejoice; let*ld the sea roar, and all that fills it;
let*ld the field exult, and everything in it! Then*ln shall all the trees of the forest sing for joy
before*ld the Lord,*s for he comes, for*ld he comes to judge the earth. He*ln will judge the world in righteousness, and*ld the peoples in his faithfulness.
